name: Ready... Set... SLOW!!
description:
Ready... Set... SLOW!! is a racing game for two players in which the goal is to finish in LAST place.

You can't stay at the starting line forever - your hovercraft doesn't have brakes, and trying to retrace your steps will simply boost you toward the finish.

Reaching the finish line is inevitable... but can you delay it longer than your opponent?

Good luck!
